CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 1, 1954, pg. 14 reads: "Brick Masons At Work On Belmar Gardens - Belmar Gardens, the 118-unit cooperative housing development in Twelfth Ward, is providing employment for some Negro skilled workers as the building progresses...Bricklayers B.L. Wright and Thomas Agee put in an inside wall while foreman Sy Tompkins watches...All the bricklayers are members of the Bricklayers International Union, Local No. 2 - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Bricklayers B.L. Wright and Thomas Agee working on inside wall, with foreman Sy Tompkins standing on right, standing inside unfinished block and brick building in Belmar Gardens
